name: Disaster Reporter
description:
Disaster Reporter is a hybrid VR experience.
The goal for the users is to keep their attention and do their job as an inexperienced news reporter. Meanwhile the physical and virtual world try to deter the users attention through elements of chaos and humor.  This is done through both the VR environment and physical interaction in the real world.

WARNING, this game includes moderate shaking and flashing lights! 


Recommendations

To play this game it is recommended to have 1 player for vr and and 3-10 players around this player for the physical interaction in the real world. It is also recommended for these players to read through the script and intstructions beforehand, so they can inform/cue other players for the interaction.
